item.description:
This is an informal discussion about "economic recovery" and what it means to you. What do you think we need to do in order to get this country moving forward in a positive direction?

We will meet in the JP Cohousing Great Room at one of the tables away from the newspaper readers, or move to the living room if we become too rowdy. Your host will be there to record the recommendations and forward them on to President Obama.

This is a "drop in" event--you can drop in at any time during the two-hour period, make a few comments, and leave. Or you can hang out and enjoy the friendly company of the JP Cohousers. Event is limited to a total of 19 people, so sign up now!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the computer.
item.name: What Does "Economic Recovery" Mean to You?
